name: Treasure
descr: Treasures are Items that have high monetary value.

methods.name: getName
methods.descr: Get the Name of the Entity in it's world

methods.name: setName
methods.descr: Set the Name of the Entity

methods.name: getId
methods.descr: The Unique ID of the Entity

name: ResponseQuestion
descr:
When invoked, a ResponseQuestion presents the user with a Dialog window of
consisting of questions and text input responses that the user can provide
and submit.

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Response Question item

params.descr: The World the ResponseQuestion belongs to
A description of the Response Question
A List/Table of Questions that will each have their own responses

methods.name: getDescription
methods.descr: Gets a String representation of the Question and currently input solutions.

methods.name: getResponseQuestions
methods.descr: Get the Response questions the User submitted.

name: ItemInfo
descr: Type that encapsulates descriptive information about an item queried from a peek method

methods.name: toString
methods.descr: Returns a string representation of the item

methods.name: name
methods.descr: Get the Name of the Item

methods.name: value
methods.descr: Get the Value of the Item

methods.name: weight
methods.descr: Get the Weight of the Item

methods.name: description
methods.descr: Get the Description of the Item

methods.name: index
methods.descr: Get the Index of the Item

name: Website
descr: A Website is an item that encapsulates opening a Browser Window to a given constant URL

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Website item

params.descr: The World the Website belongs to
A description of the Website item
The underlying URL of the Website item

name: World
descr: The current map can be interfaced with via the 'world'

methods.name: addEntity
methods.descr: Add and Entity to the World

params.descr: The Argument Entity to add to the World

methods.name: removeEntity
methods.descr: Removes the entity from the world

methods.name: setFlag
methods.descr:
Set Game flags for the following
'autoPlay:boolean', 'name:string', 'playstyle:[EntityTurns,RTS,TeamTurns]'

params.descr: The Flag Name [autoPlay,name,playstyle, timesReset]
The Value of the flag

methods.name: setTile
methods.descr: Sets the Tile at the argument positions

params.descr: The X position of the tile
The Y position of the tile
The TileType of the tile ['floor', 'tile', etc...]

methods.name: setTiles
methods.descr: Set's a range of Tiles

methods.name: showAlert
methods.descr: Creates an alert message

params.descr: The Content of the Alert Message
The Title of the Alert window

methods.name: totalValue
methods.descr: Query the total value of Treasure and Items found in the World

methods.name: findEntity
methods.descr: Finds and returns the first entity with the specified name or id

params.descr: Name is a String, ID is a number

methods.name: logQuest
methods.descr: Logs a message with a Quest logging level

params.descr: The message to Log

methods.name: getGoal
methods.descr: Returns the location of the Goal in the world.

methods.name: alert
methods.descr: Creates and displays an Alert window.

params.descr: The Alert message
The Title of the Alert Window

methods.name: openBrowser
methods.descr: Opens a Browser Window using the argument URL string

params.descr: The desired URL

name: ItemChest
descr:
An ItemChest is an Entity that contains a large Inventory.
The ItemChest can be isLocked or unlocked based off of events or by unlocking
with a key.

methods.name: lock
methods.descr: Set the ItemChest to a isLocked state.

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Creates a new ItemChest instance

params.descr: The World the ItemChest belongs to
The name the ItemChest is bound to in it's script environment
The X position of the ItemChest
The Y position of the ItemChest

methods.name: unlock
methods.descr: Set the ItemChest to an unlocked state.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.descr: Returns true if ItemChest is isLocked, false otherwise.

name: RpgActor
descr: A type that encapsulates abilities and stats for players with Rpg attributes

methods.name: stats
methods.descr:
Get the stats of the player.
(strength, dexterity, intelligence, wisdom) = player:getStats()

methods.name: strength
methods.descr: Get the Strength stat of the Player

methods.name: dexterity
methods.descr: Get the Dexterity stat of the Player

methods.name: intelligence
methods.descr: Get the Intelligence stat of the Player

methods.name: wisdom
methods.descr: Get the Wisdom stat of the Player

methods.name: setStats
methods.descr: Sets the Stats of the Player character to the specified values.

params.descr: A list of Integers corresponding to the players stats

methods.name: setHealth
methods.descr: Sets the Health of the Player to the provided value.

params.descr: An Integer value greater than 0

methods.name: setMana
methods.descr: Sets the Mana of the Player to the provided value.

params.descr: An Integer value greater than 0

methods.name: setStamina
methods.descr: Sets the Stamina of the Player to the provided value.

params.descr: An Integer value greater than 0

methods.name: health
methods.descr:
Get the Health of the Player.
When the Players health is Zero, the player dies.

methods.name: mana
methods.descr:
Get the Mana of the Player
Mana is consumed when using spells, or Items that require magic power.

methods.name: stamina
methods.descr:
Get the Stamina of the Player
Certain actions require stamina to perform, such as attacks, or pushing heavy objects.

name: MultipleChoiceQuestion
descr:
A MultipleChoiceQuestion is a question that presents the invoker with a dialog window
With multiple options, where only one option can be selected.
By clicking Submit, the player sets a field in the Question that can be queried
from a grading script.

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new MultipleChoice question item

params.descr: The World the question belongs to
The underlying question.
A List/Table of answers to the question

methods.name: setAnswers
methods.descr: Set the Answers for the question

methods.name: getSubmittedAnswer
methods.descr: Get the Answer to submitted for the question.

name: Weapon
descr:
A Weapon is an Item that can be used to damage adjacent Entities not on the players Team.
Different types of weapons have different properties, such as more Damage, more Range, or
a higher attack Speed (less cool down after an attack)

methods.name: stats
methods.descr: Gets the Stats of the Weapon

name: Item
descr: An Item is a type representing an immaterial game item that is carried in an Inventory.

methods.name: setName
methods.descr: Set the Name of the Item

methods.name: setValue
methods.descr: Set the Value of the Item

methods.name: setDescription
methods.descr: Set the description of the Item

methods.name: setWeight
methods.descr: Set the Weight of the Item

methods.name: getName
methods.descr: Get the Name of the Item

methods.name: getValue
methods.descr: Get the Value of the Item

methods.name: getWeight
methods.descr: Get the Weight of the Item

methods.name: getDescription
methods.descr: Get the Description of the Item

methods.name: create
methods.descr: Create a new Goal Instance

params.descr: The world the Goal belongs to
The name of the goal
The X position of the Goal
The Y position of the Goal

name: Sword
descr: A Sword is a fast weapon that does a reasonable amount of damage, but has a limited range.

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Sword item

params.descr: The World the Sword should belong to

name: Actor
descr: The base type for Bot and Player entities

methods.name: position
methods.descr: Get the position of the player as an x,y varargs pair

methods.name: push
methods.descr: Pushes any pushable objects in the associated direction

params.descr: The Direction to try to push an object

methods.name: peek
methods.descr:
Peek at an entities inventory in the specified direction
relative to the actor.

params.descr: The direction to peek [up,down,left,right]

methods.name: say
methods.descr: Prints the argument text above the player

params.descr: The text for the player to say

methods.name: grab
methods.descr: Grabs any Item Entities that exist in the tile the player is in

methods.name: look
methods.descr: Actor inspects objects or entities in the specified direction

params.descr: A Varargs of either the Dir to look. Nil if Looking at the players position

methods.name: giveRight
methods.descr: Give the item specified at the actors inventory index to the entity RIGHT from the actor

params.descr: A varargs of the index from the source Actors inventory, and optionally the destination index of the target inventory

methods.name: giveLeft
methods.descr: Give the item specified at the actors inventory index to the entity LEFT from the actor

params.descr: A varargs of the index from the source Actors inventory, and optionally the destination index of the target inventory

methods.name: giveDown
methods.descr: Give the item specified at the actors inventory index to the entity DOWN from the actor

params.descr: A varargs of the index from the source Actors inventory, and optionally the destination index of the target inventory

methods.name: giveUp
methods.descr: Give the item specified at the actors inventory index to the entity UP from the actor

params.descr: A varargs of the index from the source Actors inventory, and optionally the destination index of the target inventory

methods.name: lookUp
methods.descr: Actor inspects objects or entities UP relative to their position

methods.name: lookDown
methods.descr: Actor inspects objects or entities DOWN relative to their position

methods.name: lookLeft
methods.descr: Actor inspects objects or entities LEFT relative to their position

methods.name: lookRight
methods.descr: Actor inspects objects or entities RIGHT relative to their position

methods.name: pushUp
methods.descr: Push objects UP relative to the Actor

methods.name: pushDown
methods.descr: Push objects DOWN relative to the Actor

methods.name: pushLeft
methods.descr: Push objects LEFT relative to the Actor

methods.name: pushRight
methods.descr: Push objects RIGHT relative to the Actor

methods.name: peekUp
methods.descr: Peek at the inventory of any entity UP relative to the actor

methods.name: peekDown
methods.descr: Peek at the inventory of any entity DOWN relative to the actor

methods.name: peekLeft
methods.descr: Peek at the inventory of any entity LEFT relative to the actor

methods.name: peekRight
methods.descr: Peek at the inventory of any entity RIGHT relative to the actor

methods.name: take
methods.descr: Take an item from the inventory of any entity found in the specified direction if possible

params.descr: The Direction of the entity to take the item from
The Index of the Item

methods.name: steps
methods.descr: Get the Number of Steps taken by the Actor

methods.name: bumps
methods.descr: Get the Number of Collisions made by the Actor with walls

methods.name: inventory
methods.descr: Get the Inventory of the Player

methods.name: use
methods.descr: Contextually use an object/entity in the specified direction relative to the actor

params.descr: The direction of the entity or object to Use

methods.name: left
methods.descr: Moves the player LEFT

params.descr: The number of spaces to move

methods.name: right
methods.descr: Moves the player RIGHT

params.descr: The number of spaces to move

methods.name: up
methods.descr: Moves the player UP

params.descr: The number of spaces to move

methods.name: down
methods.descr: Moves the player DOWN

params.descr: The number of spaces to move

methods.name: move
methods.descr: Moves the player a given direction

params.descr: The direction and number of spaces to move

methods.name: peekInventory
methods.descr:
Peek at the Inventory of the associated entity
Returns a list of tables with a 'name' and 'description' keys with the associated values.

name: Gold
descr: Gold is a Treasure that has a value that is a function of its weight.

params.descr: The World the gold belongs to
The weight of the Gold item

methods.name: key

methods.name: gold
methods.descr: Create a new GoldItem

The Y position of the GoldItem

The Y position of the DiamondEntity

methods.name: gem

The X position of the GemEntity
The Y position of the GemEntity

methods.name: multipleChoiceQuestion
methods.descr: Create a new Multiple Choice Question

params.descr: World + x + y + descr + questions ...

methods.name: inventory
methods.descr: Get the ItemEntity's inventory

methods.name: toString
methods.descr: Look at an Item Entity

name: Player
descr: A Player is an Actor afforded with more privileges

methods.name: requestTrade
methods.descr: Requests to trade items with an entity. Completes trade if both entities request a trade.

params.descr: The target Player to trade with

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Assigns a new player

params.descr: The assigned World
The X position of the player
The Y Position of the player

methods.name: setPosition
methods.descr: Set the position of the entity

params.descr: The X position of the entity
The Y position of the entity

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Bot instance

params.descr: The World the Bot belongs to
The Name of the Bot
The X position of the Bot
The Y position of the Bot

name: TileTypes
descr:
A collection of Tile Types of the following varieties.
floor,grass,wall,pit,goal

methods.name: getTile
methods.descr: Returns a TileType of the specific type

params.descr: A TileType of the specified Type

methods.name: help
methods.descr: Return a String documenting the functionality of the invoked type

name: Diamond
descr: An Item is a Treasure that is very valuable!

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a Diamond

params.descr: The World the Diamond belongs to

name: Bow
descr: A Bow is a ranged weapon with a low attack speed.

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Bow item

params.descr: The World that the Bow should belong to

name: Door
descr: A Door is an entity that can be triggered to open by events or unlocked with Keys

methods.name: lock
methods.descr: Sets the Door to a locked state.

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Door instance

params.descr: The World the Door belongs to
The X position of the door
The Y position of the door

methods.name: toggleOpen
methods.descr: Toggles the open state of the door

methods.name: unlock
methods.descr: Sets the Door to an unlocked state.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.descr: Returns true if Door is locked, false otherwise.

methods.name: use
methods.descr: Toggle the open state of the door depending on if it is locked.

name: Gem
descr: Gems are a Treasure that have some value

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Creates a new Gem

params.descr: The World the Gem belongs to

name: ItemReference
descr:
Inventory Item type that represents an item at a given spot in an Inventory.
Item changes if the Inventory is modified.

methods.name: hasItem
methods.descr: Test if the ItemReference contains an item

methods.name: useSelf
methods.descr: Contextually uses the Item on the caller. Action varies depending on the Item.

methods.name: give
methods.descr: Give the item to any entities found at the specified direction relative to the owner of the item.

params.descr: A direction relative to the entity

methods.name: giveRight
methods.descr: Give the Item to any entities 'Right' relative to the owner of the item

methods.name: giveLeft
methods.descr: Give the Item to any entities 'Left' relative to the owner of the item

methods.name: giveDown
methods.descr: Give the Item to any entities 'Down' relative to the owner of the item

methods.name: giveUp
methods.descr: Give the Item to any entities 'Up' relative to the owner of the item

methods.name: useRight
methods.descr: Uses the Item at the Location right relative to the owner of the Item

methods.name: useLeft
methods.descr: Uses the Item at the Location left relative to the owner of the Item

methods.name: useDown
methods.descr: Uses the Item at the Location down relative to the owner of the Item

methods.name: useUp
methods.descr: Uses the Item at the Location up relative to owner of the Item

methods.name: use
methods.descr: Contextually uses the Item. Action varies depending on the Item.

methods.name: name
methods.descr: Asks the Item Reference for the name of the given Item

methods.name: value
methods.descr: Asks the Item Reference for the monetary value of the given Item

methods.name: weight
methods.descr: Asks the Item Reference for the weight of the given Item

methods.name: description
methods.descr: Asks the Item Reference for a description of the given Item

methods.name: setItem
methods.descr: Sets the underlying value of the Item Reference to the provided Item.

params.descr: An Item

methods.name: getItem
methods.descr: Gets the referenced Item

name: Switch
descr: A Switch is an Entity that's contextual use function invokes a event

methods.name: setEnabled
methods.descr: Sets the current state of the switch

params.descr: A boolean value

methods.name: getEnabled
methods.descr: Get the Switch's enabled flag

methods.name: use
methods.descr: Use the given switch

name: SpellBook
descr: A Spell book is a powerful weapon that has a medium range and is quite slow.

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Spell Book item

params.descr: The World that the Spell Book should belong to

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a WeaponStats table

params.descr: Weapon Damage in range [0..10]
Weapon Speed in range [0..10]
Weapon Range in range [0..10]

methods.name: damage
methods.descr: Gets the Damage stat of the Weapon

methods.name: speed
methods.descr: Gets the Speed stat of the Weapon

methods.name: range
methods.descr: Gets the Range stat of the Weapon

name: Note
descr: A Note is an Item that contains user or author provided text.

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Note item.

params.descr: The World the Note belongs to
The text body of the Note

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Block

params.descr: The World that contains the Block
The X position of the Block
The Y position of the Block

methods.name: setMovable
methods.descr: Set the entity to a movable state with a boolean flag

params.descr: A Boolean: True if Block should be moveable, false otherwise

name: Sign
descr: An Entity type that can be inspected

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Sign

params.descr: The World the Sign belongs to
The Message the Sign should display
The X position of the Sign
The Y position of the Sign

methods.name: setMessage
methods.descr: Change the message that the sign displays

params.descr: The new message that should display

methods.name: say
methods.descr: Prints the argument text above the player

params.descr: The text for the player to say

name: Inventory
descr: An Inventory is a data type that has functionality supporting accessing and retrieving Item Types

methods.name: get
methods.descr: Get an array of ItemReferences to the Inventory

methods.name: toString
methods.descr: Get a String representation of the Inventory

methods.name: size
methods.descr: Get the Size of the Inventory

methods.name: capacity
methods.descr: Query the current capacity of the Inventory

methods.name: reset
methods.descr: Resets the inventory to Empty Item values

methods.name: peek
methods.descr: Get the ItemReference at the specified index of the Inventory

params.descr: The Index into the Inventory

methods.name: swap
methods.descr: Swap the items at the two positions in the inventory

params.descr: The first item to swap
The second item to swap

methods.name: weight
methods.descr: Query the total weight of items in the inventory

methods.name: maxWeight
methods.descr: Get the Max Weight this Inventory can support

methods.name: putItem
methods.descr: Puts an ItemReferences Item into this inventory

params.descr: The ItemReference to deref and place into this inventory

methods.name: addItem
methods.descr: Adds the Item to the Inventory if possible

params.descr: The Item to add

methods.name: totalValue
methods.descr: Calculates the total value of the contents of the Inventory

methods.name: getItem
methods.descr: Get the underlying Item contained by the ItemReference at the index in the Inventory

params.descr: The Index of the Item

methods.name: unpack
methods.descr: Unpacks the Inventory contents to a Lua Varargs type

name: Key
descr: A Key is an Item that is typically used to Open Doors or Item Chests

methods.name: new
methods.descr: Create a new Key item

params.descr: The World the Key should belong to
